${ModID}:ImpendingDay.NAME: Impending Day
${ModID}:ImpendingDay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, heal !M! HP and Exhaust.

${ModID}:StarOfExtinction.NAME: Star of Extinction
${ModID}:StarOfExtinction.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card and permanently remove it from the master deck. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
